Class ToggleSwitch

Represents a switch which allows users to turn something on or off.

Namespace: Celestial.UIToolkit.Controls
Assembly: Celestial.UIToolkit.dll
Syntax
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "Active", GroupName = "CommonStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "MouseOverActive", GroupName = "CommonStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "Pressed", GroupName = "CommonStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "On", GroupName = "ToggledStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "Off", GroupName = "ToggledStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "Dragging", GroupName = "ToggledStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "OnContent", GroupName = "ContentDisplayStates")]
[TemplateVisualState(Name = "OffContent", GroupName = "ContentDisplayStates")]
[TemplatePart(Name = "PART_DraggableArea", Type = typeof(Thumb))]
public class ToggleSwitch : CommonVisualStatesControl, DUCE.IResource, IAnimatable, IFrameworkInputElement, IInputElement, ISupportInitialize, IHaveResources, IQueryAmbient

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source
